review:
Well spoken .. and well informed doctor
Definitely i would recommend dr. Nitan garg to my friends and family.

Waiting time is never long.... **** ****** **** explains the issue very well... least follow ups but effective treatment.... 
You can take his opd or come in emergency as well based on your urgency and issue....

First this guy is not giving proper time and explanation. Second, Practo is showing his availability at 10:20 am and the hospital is saying he will come after 12 pm, no responsibility *** ************** ********** I have not seen.
Visited at scheduled time 4:30 a.m, after traveling 10 Km, when i reached hospital, at reception i came to know that doctor is not present and he left.i was not informed early about this.

I had taken appointment and visited the hospital for general physician concern. Dr. Nitin was quite good and friendly with me. All the things were fine for me in like clinic was hygienic, consultation was on time and clinic staff response has been good only. I would like to recommend this doctor for my friends and family members.

I had taken appointment for my father and visited the clinic for normal check up. Dr. Nitin was friendly with us and done the check up. All the things were good only for us like no waiting time, staff response etc. We are completely with his doctor and if any of my friends or family members need  consultation means I would definitely recommend this doctor only.
Doctor was too polite and listen your problem then advise the treatment not complicated after Understand the problem giving prescription
he is very nice person and relax to listen the problem and Ud advise appropriate solution to the the the related problem
